code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState=[];var cartslice=createSlice({name:"Cart",initialState:initialState,reducers:{add:function add(state,action){state.push(action.payload);},remove:function remove(state,action){return state.filter(function(item){return item.id!==action.payload;});}}});var _cartslice$actions=cartslice.actions,add=_cartslice$actions.add,remove=_cartslice$actions.remove;export{add,remove};export default cartslice.reducer;
